alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 03 at 6:53PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Archer and southeastern Baylor Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 653 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Westover to 6 miles northeast of Millers Creek Reservoir. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Megargel and Westover. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
